title: Evers Cubs on shirt : FF/FT BLAZER !
author: 823dek

posts.post_title: Evers Cubs on shirt : FF/FT BLAZER !
posts.post_content:
Listening to hear the offerings about this rare beauty with this centering. None better looking !

Sale or trade.

Interested.

Please send price and high resolution scan (or at least explanation for why it got a '5') to [url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]

Best,
S

have 2 good offers so far.

THANKS Doug -Scott-John .I am willing to work something out ,Iam more of a portrait guy .So it has to be a good cash offer or some portraits E 0r T

Thank you
To have survived all these years with those corners, looks like the technical grade is due to staining on back borders and small brown surface blemish above shoulder...

Appreciate the summing up , it helps . What you are talking about above the shoulder is in the print of the blue. I think it was abit too technical, but Iam very happy to own or trade. Thank you for the acknowledgement of the card. I havent seen any with these corners in the 22 yrs of prewar collecting. When I had all the Evers in E cards and 15 portraits, this would have never been on the table .When have you seen this card with these boarders and centered ?

Trading is fun or cash is good as well. My opinion and a 10x. I still value it as a 6.5 , what do I know?

;)
